summary: Minimap is not synchronised with main map

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Use one of the samples with a minimap, eg SampleWithMinimapItemizedoverlay 2. Drag the main map 3. Drag the minimap What is the expected output? What do you see instead? When you drag the main map, the minimap should move, and vice versa
I'm not sure about that ... I think it does move sometimes, but not always. I'll have a look at that ...
The mini-map is fixed in the trunk in the org.osmdroid namespace. See Issue 124.
